content: Crimson-Silver Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against after defeating the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and the Yin-Yang Fish in The Emerald Hall during Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway from top of the mountain, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crimson-Silver_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Crimson-Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Crimson-Silver Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against after defeating the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and the Yin-Yang Fish in The Emerald Hall during Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway from top of the mountain, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
